name: codegen-example
description: An example demonstrating the Calimero SDK's generated client with React hooks.

scripts.regenerate:abi-conformance: cd .. && pnpm --filter @calimero/abi-codegen build && mkdir -p codegen-example/src/generated && node packages/abi-codegen/dist/cli.js -i packages/abi-codegen/__fixtures__/abi_conformance.json -o codegen-example/src/generated/abi-conformance --client-name AbiConformanceClient --import-path @calimero-network/calimero-client && cd codegen-example && echo 'export { AbiConformanceClient } from "./AbiConformanceClient";' > src/generated/abi-conformance/index.ts && echo 'export * from "./types";' >> src/generated/abi-conformance/index.ts
